EmailTemplate.subject: Case Closure: {!Account.Name}, {!Case.CaseNumber}, {!Case.Subject}, {!Case.Reference_Number__c}

Dear {!Contact.Name}, Thank you for contacting Nokia Care via {!Case.Origin}. We appreciate your continued business and the opportunity to assist you with your inquiry.
Your Case {!Case.CaseNumber} has been closed. Details of the Case may be found below for your reference.
Issue Reported: {!Case.Subject} Case Product: {!Case.Product} Case Severity: {!Case.Severity__c}
If you would like to view or update your case online, please click here:
If you do not have online access, you may register here:
Please provide your feedback here. The survey will be available during the next {!$Setup.CH_Survey__c.CH_Expiration_Date__c} days. Regards, Nokia Support Services
